title: How-To: Add Lines to a Query
description:
Explains how to add new lines when editing queries in the LogScale UI without accidentally running them.
Typically this is done with a modifier such as Shift+Enter to insert a hard line-break inside the query editor.

examples.name: Keyboard interaction
examples.description: Move the cursor where a new line is needed and press Shift+Enter to insert a line-break inside the query editor.
